sourcesContent:
import { Box, Heading, Text } from "@chakra-ui/react";

export default function Faq() {
    const style={}
  return (
    <Box>
      <Heading>Frequenty Asked Questions</Heading>
      <Text>
        Why should you make sure that you always book through Tripvillas.com and
        not directly with the owner?
      </Text>
      <Text>
        Your credit card information is safe and never shared with the owners of
        properties.
      </Text>

      <Text>
        You benefit from our intervention in case the property owner has
        misrepresented the facts or anything goes wrong during your travel.
      </Text>

      <Text>
        You benefit from our refund policy in case you decide to change your
        mind.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        You need to have at least 100USD in your account before you request for
        payout. On being eligible for payout, you can empty your account.
      </Text>

      <Text>How do I cancel my booking?</Text>
      <Text>
        Please contact our team at support@tripvillas.com if you want to cancel
        your booking and they will assist you.
      </Text>

      <Text>What is the cancellation policy?</Text>
      <Text>
        Cancellations done 90 Days before the check-in date receive 50% of the
        booking amount minus a 200USD processing fee.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        Cancellations done less than 90 days before the check-in date are not
        eligible for any refunds.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        Please note that our properties are private holiday homes and not Hotels
        with dedicated marketing teams. It is not possible for the owners to
        accommodate cancellations especially due to the seasonal nature of
        travel.
      </Text>
      <Text>What happens with my money?</Text>
      <Text>
        For all bookings made on our website www.tripvillas.com, as soon as your
        payment has been received you will be able to access your voucher.
        Please note that you are not protected if you pay any of the owners
        directly or outside our system.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        As soon as your payment has been received you will be able to access
        your voucher.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        All funds are initially transferred to Tripvillas' escrow service.
      </Text>
      <Text>
        If you notice any problems with your booking within 48 hours of arriving
        at the property, inform us immediately and we will freeze the funds.
        Otherwise, the funds are released to the owner's account.
      </Text>

      <Text>
        In case of a dispute, our customer support team will get in touch with
        the traveler and the owner to resolve the issue.
      </Text>
    </Box>
  );
}
